channel.title: What do you guys use to make cover art/logos?
channel.description: What apps or software do you guys use to make your cool logos and cover art? Hoping to make a sweet one like yours...

item.title: What do you guys use to make cover art/logos?
item.dc:creator: Little_Baby
item.description:
Nah fam, I just use emulators if somethings mobile exclusive.

item.title: What do you guys use to make cover art/logos?
item.dc:creator: crystldawnmusic
item.description:
crystldawnmusic:

Trigraphy, Over and Canva.

I use an iPad for these, as Trigraphy and Over are mobile-exclusive.

item.title: What do you guys use to make cover art/logos?
item.dc:creator: DontPartyWithGuns
item.description:
Canva is how Ive been making all of my album art from the beginning and my logo I made using (wait for it) skype.

I took a profile picture for my skype account and edited it. I liked it so much that I saved the photo and have used it ever since.

item.source: What do you guys use to make cover art/logos?

item.title: What do you guys use to make cover art/logos?
item.dc:creator: phenylalanine
item.description:
On the Computer

  • Photoshop
  • Illustrator

Apps

  • Photoshop Fix
  • Photoshop Mix (for layering)
  • PS Express
  • iColorama (TONS of effects)
  • Pxture (great when you want an image inside text)
  • Instagram (good for easily adjusting perspective)
  • And now I’m playing with Assembly & Canva

Read full topic
item.source: What do you guys use to make cover art/logos?
